desc.cn: libSRTP 提供安全实时传输协议 （SRTP）、通用安全转换 （UST） 和支持加密内核的实现。SRTP API 记录在 include/srtp.h 中，库位于 libsrtp2.a 中（编译后）
desc.en: libSRTP provides an implementation of the Secure Real-time Transport Protocol (SRTP), the Universal Security Transform (UST), and a supporting cryptographic kernel. The SRTP API is documented in include/srtp.h, and the library is in libsrtp2.a (after compilation)
